programme.title: May Day protest in Moscow
programme.short_synopsis: The 1991 May Day parade in Moscow is discussed with UN Soviet Ambassador Andrei Gromyko.
programme.medium_synopsis: A May Day parade in Moscow gives Alistair Cooke a curious topic to discuss with UN Soviet Ambassador Andrei Gromyko before  considering cummunists in America.
